bridge-type.label: Smartthings Hub
bridge-type.description: Smartthings Hub V2 that is attached to the same network

parameter.name: smartthingsIp
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: IP address of the Smartthings Hub

parameter.name: smartthingsPort
parameter.label: IP Port Number
parameter.description: Port number of the Smartthings Hub

thing-type.label: Battery Status
thing-type.description: An indication of the status of the battery

thing-type.label: Beacon
thing-type.description: The presence value of the beacon

thing-type.label: Bulb
thing-type.description: Allows for the control of a bulb device

thing-type.label: Contact Sensor
thing-type.description: Allows reading the value of a contact sensor device

thing-type.label: Door Control
thing-type.description: Allow for the control of a door

thing-type.label: Energy Meter
thing-type.description: Read the energy consumption of an energy metering device

thing-type.label: Image Capture
thing-type.description: Allows for the capture of an image on devices that support it

thing-type.label: Indicator
thing-type.description: The indicator capability gives you the ability to set the indicator LED light on a Z-Wave switch

thing-type.label: Infrared Level
thing-type.description: Allows for the control of the infrared level attribute of a device

thing-type.label: Lock
thing-type.description: Allow for the control of a lock device

thing-type.label: Lock Only
thing-type.description: Allow for the lock control of a lock device

thing-type.label: Media Controller
thing-type.description: Allows for the control of a media controller device

thing-type.label: Motion Sensor
thing-type.description: Allows for the ability to read motion sensor device states

thing-type.label: Music Player
thing-type.description: Allows for control of a music playing device

thing-type.label: Outlet
thing-type.description: Allows for the control of an outlet device

thing-type.label: pH Measurement
thing-type.description: Read the pH value off of a pH measurement capable device

thing-type.label: PowerMeter
thing-type.description: Allows for reading the power consumption from devices that report it

thing-type.label: Power Source
thing-type.description: The current power source for the device

thing-type.label: Presence Sensor
thing-type.description: The ability to see the current status of a presence sensor device

thing-type.label: Humidity Sensor
thing-type.description: Allow reading the relative humidity from devices that support it

thing-type.label: Shock Sensor
thing-type.description: A Device that senses whether or not there is a shock

thing-type.label: Signal Strength
thing-type.description: Gives the ability to read the signal stregth of Devices that support it

thing-type.label: Sleep Sensor
thing-type.description: A Device that senses whether or not someone is sleeping

thing-type.label: Smoke Detector
thing-type.description: Measure smoke and optionally carbon monoxide levels

thing-type.label: Step Sensor
thing-type.description: A Device that works as a step counter

thing-type.label: Switch Level
thing-type.description: Allows for the control of the level attribute of a light

thing-type.label: Temperature Measurement
thing-type.description: Get the temperature from a Device that reports current temperature

thing-type.label: Thermostat
thing-type.description: Allows for the control of a thermostat device

thing-type.label: Three Axis
thing-type.description: Gives the three axis coordinates for devices that support it

thing-type.label: Ultraviolet Index
thing-type.description: Gives the ability to get the ultraviolet index from devices that report it

thing-type.label: Valve
thing-type.description: Allows for the control of a valve device

thing-type.label: Voltage Measurement
thing-type.description: Get the value of voltage measured from devices that support it

thing-type.label: Water Sensor
thing-type.description: Get the status off of a water sensor device

channel-type.label: Three Axis
channel-type.description: This string contains the x, y, z coordinates
